_comment: Design system configuration for the blueprint form renderer.
classPrefix: A string prepended to each component role to generate CSS class names.
The renderer applies these classes to @trussworks/react-uswds components so the
active design system's styles take effect.
classOverrides: Optional per-component overrides when the design system's class
names don't follow the {prefix}-{role} convention.  Only specify the keys that
differ — unspecified keys use the generated name from classPrefix.
Available keys: form, formGroup, label, input, select, fieldset, radio,
